short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fix the raise hand button in Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We've all been there when we click by accident the raise hand button and are embarrassed. This extension fixes that - it will ask to confirm you want to raise the hand, alternatively offering to open reactions.
